panels.content:
# Comments

New comments on guides, wikis, and forum posts.

panels.description: Existing comments on guides and guide steps.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

panels.description: Existing comments on forum questions and answers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT count(commentid) from comments


where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR comments.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR comments.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

(context = "step" or context = "guide") and

FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) >= SUBDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) <= $__timeTo()
and comments.status != "deleted"
;

SELECT count(commentid) from comments


where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR comments.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR comments.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

(context = "step" or context = "guide") and

and

and comments.status != "deleted"
;

SELECT comments.date as time, 

 DATE_FORMAT( from_unixtime(comments.date), "%b %Y") as metric,
       count(commentid) as value
FROM comments


-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR comments.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR comments.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

(context = "step" or context = "guide") and

FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) >= $__timeFrom()
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) <= $__timeTo()
and comments.status != "deleted"

GROUP BY 

comments.date
;

select title, 
host_guide, commentid, guide_meta.device,
context, 

gusers.username, user_privileges.privilegeid, content, 
-- rating, 
status, 
CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') as "Comment Date", 


case
when com.date_mod=0
then CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00')
else
CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date_mod), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00')
end as "Date Modified"


from
(select 
title,
case
when context="guide" then contextid
when context="step" then host.guideid
END as host_guide,
context,
userid,
content,
status, 
date,
commentid,
date_mod
from comments

left join (select stepid, guideid from guide_step_revisions where guide_step_revisions.type="CREATED" group by stepid) host on host.stepid=comments.contextid

where (context = "step" or context = "guide")

) com


left join (select userid, username from global_users group by userid) 
gusers on gusers.userid=com.userid

left join user_privileges on user_privileges.userid=gusers.userid
left join guide_current on guide_current.guideid=com.host_guide
left join guide_revisions on guide_current.guide_revisionid=guide_revisions.guide_revisionid
left join guide_meta on guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid=guide_meta.revisionid

where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR com.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR gusers.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

($CATEGORYID = 'All Categories' OR guide_meta.device = $CATEGORYID) and


FROM_UNIXTIME(com.date) >= $__timeFrom()
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(com.date) <= $__timeTo()

;

SELECT comments.date as time, 

 DATE_FORMAT( from_unixtime(comments.date), "%b %Y") as metric,
       count(commentid) as value
FROM comments


-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR comments.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR comments.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

comments.context = "wiki" and

FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) >= $__timeFrom()
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) <= $__timeTo()
and comments.status != "deleted"

GROUP BY 

comments.date
;

select com.title, 
host_post,
commentid,
urltitle,
context,
gusers.username, user_privileges.privilegeid, content, 
-- rating, 
status, 
CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') as "Comment Date", 

case
when com.date_mod=0
then CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00')
else
CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date_mod), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00')
end as "Date Modified"

from
(select 
title, 

case
when parentid is null then contextid
when parentid is not null then parentid
END as host_post,

context,
userid,
content,
status, 
date,
commentid,
date_mod
from comments



where context="wiki") com


left join (select userid, username from global_users group by userid) 
gusers on gusers.userid=com.userid
left join user_privileges on user_privileges.userid=gusers.userid
left join (select wikiid, title as urltitle from wikis) wt on wt.wikiid=com.host_post


where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR com.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR gusers.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

FROM_UNIXTIME(com.date) >= $__timeFrom()
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(com.date) <= $__timeTo()


;

SELECT comments.date as time, 

 DATE_FORMAT( from_unixtime(comments.date), "%b %Y") as metric,
       count(commentid) as value
FROM comments


-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR comments.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR comments.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

comments.context = "post" and

FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) >= $__timeFrom()
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(comments.date) <= $__timeTo()
and comments.status != "deleted"

GROUP BY 

comments.date
;

select title, 
host_post,
commentid,
context,
gusers.username, user_privileges.privilegeid, content, 
-- rating, 
status, 
CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00') as "Comment Date", 

case
when com.date_mod=0
then CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00')
else
CONVERT_TZ(from_unixtime(com.date_mod), @@session.time_zone, '+00:00')
end as "Date Modified"

from
(select 
title, 

case
when parentid is null then contextid
when parentid is not null then parentid
END as host_post,

context,
userid,
content,
status, 
date,
commentid,
date_mod
from comments



where context="post") com


left join (select userid, username from global_users group by userid) 
gusers on gusers.userid=com.userid
left join user_privileges on user_privileges.userid=gusers.userid

where 
($USERID = 'All Users' OR com.userid = $USERID) and

($TEAM = 'All Teams' OR gusers.userid in (select userid from user_teams where user_teams.teamid=$TEAM)) and

FROM_UNIXTIME(com.date) >= $__timeFrom()
and 
FROM_UNIXTIME(com.date) <= $__timeTo()


;

list.definition: select  CONCAT(global_users.username, " — ", "User ID:", global_users.userid) AS __text, global_users.userid AS __value from global_users
list.label: User
list.name: USERID
list.query: select  CONCAT(global_users.username, " — ", "User ID:", global_users.userid) AS __text, global_users.userid AS __value from global_users

list.definition: select  "All Categories", list.title as "Category" from (select distinct title from wikis where wikis.namespace="TOPIC") list order by 'All Categories', title ASC
list.label: Category
list.name: CATEGORYID
list.query: select  "All Categories", list.title as "Category" from (select distinct title from wikis where wikis.namespace="TOPIC") list order by 'All Categories', title ASC

list.definition: select CONCAT(name, " — ", "Team ID:", teamid) AS __text, teamid AS __value FROM teams
list.label: Team
list.name: TEAM
list.query: select CONCAT(name, " — ", "Team ID:", teamid) AS __text, teamid AS __value FROM teams
